Hmm...I'm not sure she lied about anything. I think it really was her having a fling with her ex-boyfriend. The only confusing part is that in the original he refers to what they did using the word "play" on the last page, like a situation play (high school students, cheating play, lotion play). I think this adds up to just protag realizing he was an idiot by hearing Yuri say she always wanted a ring from him. Recall he says he broke up with her because he was frustrated about not being able to find a job. Talk about a missed opportunity. Also, this has no sequel since the next work the author did was in Comic ExE 36, which is a brand new story.
